title: Looking for team/duo. Im only gold.
body:
Hi Looking for any team that will take me... Can play Top and or ADC.

Also looking for a duo.

replies.body: Hi, I'd be happy to duo if you're up for it!

hello, I have a team i will be starting up for the new year called, Team Digital Fury, so far its very small, but we're looking for players like ourselves who wish to better at the game we love and one day be a official team for the OCE label. If you want to ask any questions about it feel free to add me in game -shouri. {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
im looking for a team too. I play mid lane. i have played in tourneys before
I dont have a team but let's make one :3
